data.text: The venue is truly stunning, a perfect setting for a delightful dinner with my family. The picturesque fountain view added a touch of elegance to the experience, and the staff was indeed warm and welcoming. However, if I were to suggest an improvement, it would undeniably be the speed of service. It was quite disappointing to wait a whole 40 minutes for my pizza and pasta to arrive, especially after the starters came out in a prompt 20 minutes. The prolonged wait for the main course somewhat dampened an otherwise enjoyable evening.
data.title: Beautiful view

data.text:
Ramadan Nights by Armani
March 10 – April 08, 2024
Armani Hotel Dubai

What does the Armani Hotel offer for Ramadan?

- Share the spirit of Ramadan in the stunning setting of Armani/Pavilion
- As the sun sets, break your fast with a curated Iftar experience 

Iftar at Armani/Pavilion
Sunset until 9pm
AED 385 per person including Ramadan juices, soft drinks, freshly brewed coffee and tea

It sounds good. but there is one "BUT!" Nowhere does it say that there will be half naked girls too! Why call a dinner "iftar" if there is no dress code? I couldn't believe my eyes!

I came with my family, and we were waiting for the adhan, and no one ate until the adhan began, since this is a Muslim country, people fast here, and the hotel wrote that this is a separate place for iftar, it was generally in a separate place with a separate entrance, on super "backyard" venue for ballrooms and private events. How did the “naked” girl gallop there and how did they let her through? !!!!

If you call the event a religious name, then why invite mermaids? I wouldn't have come if the event was called "dinner for naked people." I'm so shocked I can't tell you! let's call everything by their proper names!
data.title: Ramadan Nights by Armani

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest, 

Thank you for choosing to dine with us for Iftar at Armani Hotel Dubai. Rest assured that a dress code is communicated within each booking reservation shared. We apologise if the attire of another diner caused you or your family any discomfort during your experience. We hope to have an opportunity to host you again in the future and welcome you to a renewed experience. 

Kind regards,

Nicolas Bellaton
Armani Hotel Dubai
owner_response.author: Armani Hotel Dubai

data.text: It was indeed a memorable short but sweet stay. Since its my first time in Dubai, our stay here was impeccable and definitely worth the price. Upon checking in, Gracer Torres was very courteous and hospitable giving out our request to have the best room we could have and at the same time, giving us a wonderful extended service by sending us a complimentary dessert and welcome fruit serving. To name also some friendly and excellent service staff, Sagan, Kaung and Salini provided great service to us. Cant wait to be back soon with my family! :)
data.title: BEST DUBAI STAY! :)

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest, 

Thank you for choosing to Stay with Armani for your recent vacation. As we endeavor to provide world-class hospitality to all of our guests, I am pleased to note that the wonderful service and special care extended to you by Gracer, Sagar, Kaung and Salini resulted in an especially memorable experience. We are very thankful for your kind recommendation and greatly look forward to our next opportunity to host you. 

Best Regards,

Nicolas Bellaton
Armani Hotel Dubai
owner_response.author: Armani Hotel Dubai

data.text: It was definitely a pleasant experience. The staff specially the Manager, Mr Gracer Torres was very accommodating and making sure that guests are having a good experience. He is very thoughtful sending us welcome treats upon entering our room. 10/10 Will surely comeback!
data.title: Armani Hotel Dubai - 10/10

data.text:
Good food, the service staff are very helpful. Thank you for excellent service, Marife, Edz,Lyn, Michelle in  Armani Hotel Pavilion.

Iftar buffet is great. The view is amazing! All the restaurants served their signature dishes and the food experience is superb!
data.title: Excellent Iftar!
